channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Dick Cheney, one of the most powerful and polarizing vice presidents of US history, dies at 84
item.description: Former Vice President Dick Cheney has died at age 84. The hard-charging conservative became one of the most powerful and polarizing vice presidents and a leading advocate for the invasion of Iraq.

item.title: Trump’s strength, Democrats’ message and the shutdown effect. What to watch on Election Day 2025
Mamdani and Cuomo face off as New York City chooses new mayor, while Sliwa hopes for an upset
